com.gemalto.idp.mobile.ui.secureinput

Interface SecureInputBuilder

  • Deprecated. 
    Will be removed future major release, the replacement interface is SecureInputBuilderV2

    @Deprecated
public interface SecureInputBuilder
    An interface that represents Secure Pin Pad.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Detail

      • buildPinpad

        @Deprecated
android.support.v4.app.DialogFragment buildPinpad(boolean isScramble,
                                                              boolean isDoublePassword,
                                                              boolean isDialog,
                                                              SecurePinpadListener listener)
        Deprecated. Will be removed future major release.
        Create a pinpad.

        Notice: The Secure Pin Pad is designed for one-time use, this function is expected to be called once all the necessary configurations have been done when each time the Pin Pad being used.

        Parameters:
        isScramble - If this Boolean value is true then secure keypad will generate scrambled keypad. And if it is false it will show its default behavior (unscramble keypad).
        isDoublePassword - If this Boolean value is true then secure keypad will show two edit box. And if it is false it will show only one edit boxes.
        isDialog - If this Boolean value is true then secure keypad will shown as Dialog (Popup). And if it is false it will shown as View (FullScreen).
        listener - is Interface to create the communication channel between library and the main application. This interface will be used when user press Ok Button and provide the secure pin as a callback value.
        Returns:
        A dialogFragment that contains the secure keypad.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - when the listener is null
        Since:
        4.0
        See Also:
        SecureInputBuilderV2

        @Deprecated
void setDialogHeightToScreenRatio(double ratio)
        Deprecated. Will be removed future major release.
        Set the height of keypad for a Dialog. This method is only applicable if keypad is shown as Dialog (isDialog == true).
        Parameters:

      • setCharacterArray

        @Deprecated
void setCharacterArray(java.lang.String characters)
        Deprecated. Will be removed future major release.
        Set Character choices for the constitution of the PIN. This is a character set indicating the possible characters that can be displayed.
        Parameters:
        characters - Only digits and alphabets(both lower and upper case) are supported. Default : SecureInputConstant.DEFAULT_CHARACTER_ARRAY.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when this character array contains anything other than digits.
        Since:
        4.0
        See Also:
        SecureInputBuilderV2

      • setAutomaticEnabledOk

        @Deprecated
void setAutomaticEnabledOk(boolean automaticEnabledOk)
        Deprecated. Will be removed future major release.
        Sets the automatic enabling of OK button. if true: OK button in the Keypad is automatically enabled when minimum input length is entered. if false: OK button in the Keypad is always in enabled state
        Parameters:
        automaticEnabledOk - Default : SecureInputConstant.DEFAULT_AUTOMATIC_ENABLED_OK.
        Since:
        4.0
        See Also:
        SecureInputBuilderV2

      • setAutomaticOk

        @Deprecated
void setAutomaticOk(boolean automaticOk)
        Deprecated. Will be removed future major release.
        Sets automatic OK state of the button. This is set as true only when the minimum input length == maximum input length. if true: OK button is not shown on the keypad, when minimum/maximum input length is entered OK button functionality is automatically executed. if false: OK button is shown and the minimum input length != maximum input length.
        Parameters:
        automaticOk - Default : SecureInputConstant.DEFAULT_AUTOMATIC_OK.
        Since:
        4.0
        See Also:
        SecureInputBuilderV2

      • setVisibleButtonPress

        @Deprecated
void setVisibleButtonPress(boolean visibleButtonPress)
        Deprecated. Will be removed future major release.
        If this Boolean is true then when a button is pressed on the keypad, they become highlighted, if not, no highlight is enabled.
        Parameters:
        visibleButtonPress - Default : SecureInputConstant.DEFAULT_VISIBLE_BUTTON_PRESS.
        Since:
        4.0
        See Also:
        SecureInputBuilderV2

      • wipe

        @Deprecated
void wipe()
        Deprecated. Will be removed future major release.
        Wipe away all the sensitive data of the Pin Pad builder. Including setting isScrambled to false, clearing the character array and erasing keypress record.

        Notice: The wipe will only reset the character array and scramble option. other non-sensitive configuration such as color setting and text-label setting won't be reset in this function.

        Once wipe being called, the pin pad is required to be dismissed / closed and re-built before next time usage.

        Since:
        4.0
        See Also:
        SecureInputBuilderV2
